mdRecord.dcterms:description: Unidentifiable quote attributed to unidentifiable MB. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
When you are fighting, there is nothing but hate for your opponent. When you strive for greatness look with new eyes on the world each day. Only then is it possible. - MB
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Quotations
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
